title: DOJ v. RealPage Inc. (Rental Pricing)
coordination_mechanism: Shared algorithmic pricing platform with sensitive info exchange
regulatory_reasoning: DOJ alleged RealPage facilitated anticompetitive pricing via non-public data sharing

title: FTC v. Hotel Pricing Coordination
coordination_mechanism: Dynamic pricing algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: FTC found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and market intelligence

title: FTC v. Amazon (Third-Party Seller Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Platform-mediated seller pricing algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: FTC alleged Amazon facilitated seller coordination through pricing algorithms and data sharing

title: State AGs v. Uber/Lyft (Surge Pricing)
coordination_mechanism: Independent surge pricing algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: State AGs investigated but found no evidence of coordination, only competitive pricing

title: DOJ v. Meyer Manufacturing (Supply Chain Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Supply chain coordination algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: DOJ found evidence of coordinated supply chain management through shared algorithms

title: EC v. Asus (Resale Price Maintenance)
coordination_mechanism: Resale price maintenance with algorithmic enforcement
regulatory_reasoning: EC found Asus used algorithms to monitor and enforce resale price maintenance

title: DOJ v. Google (Digital Advertising Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Ad auction algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: DOJ alleged Google coordinated with competitors through ad auction algorithms

title: FTC v. Meta (Social Media Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Content recommendation algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: FTC alleged Meta coordinated with competitors through recommendation algorithms

title: FTC v. Poster Frames (Retail Pricing Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Pricing algorithms with monitoring and enforcement
regulatory_reasoning: FTC found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and monitoring

title: MAS v. Proptech (Real Estate Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Property valuation algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: MAS found coordinated property valuations through shared algorithms

title: SEC v. ATP (Financial Services Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Trading algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: SEC found coordinated trading through shared algorithms and market intelligence

title: US v. Socony-Vacuum Oil Co. (Price Monitoring)
coordination_mechanism: Price monitoring and reporting with coordination
regulatory_reasoning: Supreme Court found price monitoring and reporting constituted per se illegal coordination

title: EC v. Philips (Resale Price Maintenance)
coordination_mechanism: Resale price maintenance with algorithmic enforcement
regulatory_reasoning: EC found Philips used algorithms to monitor and enforce resale price maintenance

title: CMA v. Online Marketplace (Price Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Online marketplace pricing algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: CMA found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and market intelligence

title: ACCC v. Retail Chain (Price Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Retail pricing algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: ACCC found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and market intelligence

title: Competition Bureau v. Tech Platform (Algorithmic Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Platform algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: Competition Bureau found coordinated behavior through shared algorithms

title: JCAA v. Manufacturing (Supply Chain Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Supply chain coordination algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: JCAA found coordinated supply chain management through shared algorithms

title: KFTC v. E-commerce (Platform Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: E-commerce platform algorithms with monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: KFTC found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and market intelligence

title: CADE v. Retail (Price Coordination)
coordination_mechanism: Retail pricing algorithms with market monitoring
regulatory_reasoning: CADE found coordinated pricing through shared algorithms and market intelligence
